q: `` In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer wrote in a Feb. 9 email to employees. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways. Steve Ballmer had apparently considered a number of internal and external candidates before choosing Satya Nadella , who will replace Bob Muglia.`` We are on a path to change the world again with our next generation

, but rivals are nipping at its heels. The Chrysler Town and Country was the top-selling minivan in the U.S. last year, with sales of 112,275, or about 4,000 more than the Honda Odyssey. We are not going to give up one inch of territory, Sergio Marchionne said. Chrysler said the 2011 versions of its minivans have a new V-6 engine with improved fuel economy. One amenity is an optional heated steering wheel, a first among minivans. News On

The ruling party headquarters building next door to the museum was still in flames and billowing black smoke into the sky on Saturday, a day after protesters torched it during mass anti-government demonstrations. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, antiquities boss Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks try to extinguish the blaze in the NDP headquarters. As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said,`` I care deeply about animals'' and`` am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to`` propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. But he now lives in the 11th District again and is registered to vote there, according to 2010 campaign spokesman Bill Lockyer Maxfield. Obviously, no one knows what the outcome of redistricting will be, though there has been significant coverage of the idea that districts should reflect communities of interest, Maxfield said. Joe Simitian , meanwhile, filed a Statement of Intention to run in 2012 for the 21st Assembly District seat won in November by freshman lawmaker Rich Gordon , D-Menlo Park. This is the cloud-based version of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011, which will go head to head with other cloud-based CRM products from companies like Salesforce.com and Oracle. Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, said Steve Ballmer .`` Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud.
